Class Fleet

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Fleet

  • public class Fleet
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all ships of one player as a unit.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Group 1 - DAT055 2014

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Fleet()
      Construct all ships for one player.
